images.purpose: Marketing hero image for product detail page and social
images.prompt: Photorealistic hero shot: a clean modern workspace with a laptop open to a calendar app, a notebook with handwriting, and a steaming coffee mug — soft natural window light, shallow depth of field, warm neutral color grading, brand-accent highlight #06b6d4 on the calendar UI, no identifiable faces, minimal props, centered composition, 3:2 aspect, deliver high-res JPG (2400x1600) and optimized WebP 1200x800. Alt text: 'Consultation — expert meeting, 15 minutes.'

images.purpose: Square thumbnail for listing and product card
images.prompt: Studio-style product thumbnail: flat-lay top-down of a notebook and pen on a light-gray surface with a small calendar card that reads '15 min' — crisp lighting, soft shadows, minimal styling, brand accent #06b6d4 on calendar card, clean background, export as PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400. Alt text: '15-minute consultation thumbnail.'

images.purpose: Small listing image / avatar (used in checkout and carts)
images.prompt: Minimal iconographic mark: circular badge with '15' numeral and subtle calendar glyph, flat geometric style, 2-color palette (dark slate #0f172a + teal #06b6d4), optimized SVG and PNG 128x128, provide light/dark variants and suggested aria-label '15-minute consultation'.

images.purpose: Product detail hero for in-depth session
images.prompt: Photorealistic hero: two people in a modern meeting room (faces out of frame or blurred) pointing at a laptop screen with a project plan visible, cool neutral tones with warm highlights, natural window lighting, brand accent #06b6d4 on UI elements, 3:2 aspect, deliver JPG 2400x1600 and WebP 1200x800. Alt text: '30-minute consultation — collaborative planning.'

Clean studio thumbnail: calendar card or ticket reading '30' on a textured off-white background, subtle shadow, brand accent #06b6d4, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400, minimal composition. Alt text: '30-minute consultation thumbnail.'
Badge icon: circular badge with '30' and calendar glyph, geometric flat style, 2-color palette (dark slate + teal), SVG + PNG 128x128, include aria-label '30-minute consultation'.

Photorealistic hero: overhead of a detailed project roadmap on a desk with laptop, open planner, and coffee — cinematic natural light, shallow depth of field, rich but neutral color grading, brand accent #06b6d4 on roadmap markers, 3:2 aspect, deliver JPG 2800x1867 and optimized WebP 1400x933. Alt text: '55-minute consultation — comprehensive session.'

Studio-style thumbnail: ticket or calendar card with '55' and small checklist icon on a light neutral background, controlled soft lighting, brand accent #06b6d4, PNG 800x800 and WebP 400x400. Alt text: '55-minute consultation thumbnail.'

Circular badge with '55' numeral and simple calendar/checklist glyph, flat geometric style, dark slate + teal, SVG and PNG 128x128, provide light/dark variants and aria-label '55-minute consultation'.
